The Phoenicians were a Semitic-speaking people of somewhat unknown origin who emerged in the Levant around 3000 BC.

It is debated whether Phoenicians were actually distinct from the broader group of Semitic-speaking peoples known as Canaanites Î¦Î¿Î¹Î½Î¯ÎºÎ· peculiar Qvoinikin? ğ¤Šğ¤ğ¤ğ¤@Knossos ğ’†³ğ’† ğ’ˆ¾ğ’„´ğ’ˆ¾ KUR.ki-na-aá¸«-na KinÃ¢á¸«na Î§Î½á¾¶ ×›× ×¢×Ÿ
